meanings.definition: To make or construct on a very small scale.
meanings.sent1: Scientists microminiaturized the circuit to fit inside the tiny device.
meanings.sent2: The engineers microminiaturized the components for the miniature robot.
meanings.sent3: The students microminiaturized their project to impress their teacher with its tiny size.
meanings.sent4: The artist microminiaturized the sculpture, turning a block of clay into a detailed masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef microminiaturized the dessert, creating a tiny cake that looked like a work of art.
